22 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
23 class VertexOutHalfedgeIterator
24 {
25 public:
31  VertexOutHalfedgeIterator( CBaseMesh<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> * pMesh, CVertex * v )
32  { m_pMesh = pMesh; m_vertex = v; m_halfedge = m_pMesh->vertexMostClwOutHalfEdge(v); };
33 
37  ~VertexOutHalfedgeIterator(){};
41  void operator++() //prefix
42  {assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
43  if( m_halfedge == m_pMesh->vertexMostCcwOutHalfEdge(m_vertex) )
44  m_halfedge = NULL;
45  else
46  m_halfedge = m_pMesh->vertexNextCcwOutHalfEdge(m_halfedge); };
47 
51  void operator++(int) //postfix
52  {assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
53  if( m_halfedge == m_pMesh->vertexMostCcwOutHalfEdge(m_vertex) )

55  else
56  m_halfedge = m_pMesh->vertexNextCcwOutHalfEdge(m_halfedge); };
57 
62  CHalfEdge * value() { return m_halfedge; };
66  bool end(){ return m_halfedge == NULL; };

71 
72 private:

92 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
93 class VertexInHalfedgeIterator
94 {
95 public:
101  VertexInHalfedgeIterator(CBaseMesh<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> * pMesh, CVertex * v )
102  { m_pMesh = pMesh; m_vertex = v; m_halfedge = m_pMesh->vertexMostClwInHalfEdge(v); };
106  ~VertexInHalfedgeIterator(){};
107 
111  void operator++() //prefix
112  {
113  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
114  if( m_halfedge == m_pMesh->vertexMostCcwInHalfEdge(m_vertex) )
115  m_halfedge = NULL;
116  else
117  m_halfedge = m_pMesh->vertexNextCcwInHalfEdge(m_halfedge);
118  };
123  void operator++(int) //postfix
124  {
125  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
126  if( m_halfedge == m_pMesh->vertexMostCcwInHalfEdge(m_vertex) )
127  m_halfedge = NULL;
128  else
129  m_halfedge = m_pMesh->vertexNextCcwInHalfEdge(m_halfedge);
130  };
135  CHalfEdge * value() { return m_halfedge; };
139  bool end(){ return m_halfedge == NULL; };
143  CHalfEdge * operator*() { return value(); };
144 
145 private:

166 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
167 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
168 class VertexVertexIterator
169 {
170 public:
175  VertexVertexIterator( CVertex * v )
176  {
177  m_vertex = v;
178  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_clw_out_halfedge();
179  };
180 
184  ~VertexVertexIterator(){};
185 
190  void operator++() //prefix
191  {
192  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
193 
194  if( !m_vertex->boundary() )
195  {
196  if( m_halfedge != m_vertex->most_ccw_out_halfedge() )
197  {
198  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_source();
199  }
200  else
201  {
202  m_halfedge = NULL;
203  }
204  return;
205  }
206 
207  if( m_vertex->boundary() )
208  {
209  if( m_halfedge == (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_in_halfedge() )
210  {
211  m_halfedge = NULL;
212  return;
213  }
214 
215  CHalfEdge * he = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_source();
216 
217  if( he == NULL )
218  {
219  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_in_halfedge();
220  }
221  else
222  {
223  m_halfedge = he;
224  }
225  }
226 
227  return;
228  };
229 
230 
234  void operator++(int) //postfix
235  {
236  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
237 
238  if( !m_vertex->boundary() )
239  {
240  if( m_halfedge != (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_out_halfedge() )
241  {
242  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_source();
243  }
244  else
245  {
246  m_halfedge = NULL;
247  }
248  return;
249  }
250 
251  if( m_vertex->boundary() )
252  {
253  if( m_halfedge == (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_in_halfedge() )
254  {
255  m_halfedge = NULL;
256  return;
257  }
258 
259  CHalfEdge * he = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_source();
260 
261  if( he == NULL )
262  {
263  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_in_halfedge();
264  }
265  else
266  {
267  m_halfedge = he;
268  }
269  }
270 
271  return;
272  };
273 
278  CVertex * value()
279  {
280  if( !m_vertex->boundary() )
281  {
282  return (CVertex*)m_halfedge->target();
283  }
284 
285  if( m_halfedge != (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_in_halfedge() )
286  {
287  return (CVertex*)m_halfedge->target();
288  }
289 
290  if( m_halfedge == (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_in_halfedge() )
291  {
292  return (CVertex*)m_halfedge->source();
293  }
294  return NULL;
295  };
296 
300  CVertex * operator*() { return value(); };
301 
305  bool end(){ return m_halfedge == NULL; };
306 
310  void reset() { m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_clw_out_halfedge(); };
311 
312 private:
316  CVertex * m_vertex;
320  CHalfEdge * m_halfedge;
321 };

472 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
473 class VertexFaceIterator
474 {
475 public:
480  VertexFaceIterator( CVertex * & v )
481  {
482  m_vertex = v;
483  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_clw_out_halfedge();
484  };
488  ~VertexFaceIterator(){};
492  void operator++() //prefix
493  {
494  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
495 
496  if( m_halfedge == (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_out_halfedge() )
497  {
498  m_halfedge = NULL;
499  return;
500  }
501  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_source();
502  };
507  void operator++(int) //postfix
508  {
509  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
510 
511  if( m_halfedge == (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_ccw_out_halfedge() )
512  {
513  m_halfedge = NULL;
514  return;
515  }
516  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_source();
517  };
521  CFace * value() { return (CFace*) m_halfedge->face(); };
525  CFace * operator*() { return value(); };
529  bool end(){ return m_halfedge == NULL; };
533  void reset() { m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_vertex->most_clw_out_halfedge(); };
534 
535 private:
539  CVertex * m_vertex;
543  CHalfEdge * m_halfedge;
544 };

552 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
553 class FaceHalfedgeIterator
554 {
555 public:
560  FaceHalfedgeIterator( CFace * f )
561  {
562  m_face = f;
563  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)f->halfedge();
564  };
568  ~FaceHalfedgeIterator(){};
572  void operator++() //prefix
573  {
574  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
575  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->he_next();
576 
577  if( m_halfedge == m_face->halfedge() )
578  {
579  m_halfedge = NULL;
580  return;
581  };
582  }
583 
587  void operator++(int) //postfix
588  {
589  assert( m_halfedge != NULL );
590  m_halfedge = (CHalfEdge*)m_halfedge->he_next();
591 
592  if( m_halfedge == m_face->halfedge() )
593  {
594  m_halfedge = NULL;
595  return;
596  };
597  }
598 
602  CHalfEdge * value() { return m_halfedge; };
606  CHalfEdge * operator*() { return value(); };
607 
611  bool end(){ return m_halfedge == NULL; };
612 
613 private:
617  CFace * m_face;
621  CHalfEdge * m_halfedge;
622 };

779 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
780 class MeshVertexIterator
781 {
782 public:
787  MeshVertexIterator( CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge> * pMesh )
788  {
789  m_pMesh = pMesh;
790  m_iter = m_pMesh->vertices().begin();
791  }
795  CVertex * value() { return *m_iter; };
800  CVertex * operator*(){ return value(); };
804  void operator++() { ++ m_iter; }; //prefix
808  void operator++(int) { ++ m_iter; }; //postfix
812  bool end() { return m_iter == m_pMesh->vertices().end(); }
813 
814 private:
818  CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge> * m_pMesh;
822  typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator m_iter;
823 };

925 // Mesh->he
929 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
930 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
931 class MeshHalfEdgeIterator
932 {
933 public:
938  MeshHalfEdgeIterator( CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge> * pMesh )
939  {
940  m_pMesh = pMesh;
941  m_iter = m_pMesh->edges().begin();
942  m_id = 0;
943  }
947  CHalfEdge * value() { CEdge * e = *m_iter; return (CHalfEdge*)e->halfedge(m_id); };
951  CHalfEdge * operator*(){ return value(); };
955  void operator++() //prefix
956  {
957  ++m_id;
958 
959  switch( m_id )
960  {
961  case 1:
962  {
963  CEdge * e = *m_iter;
964  if( e->halfedge(m_id) == NULL )
965  {
966  m_id = 0;
967  ++ m_iter;
968  }
969  }
970  break;
971  case 2:
972  m_id = 0;
973  ++m_iter;
974  break;
975  }
976  };
980  void operator++(int) //postfix
981  {
982  ++m_id;
983 
984  switch( m_id )
985  {
986  case 1:
987  {
988  CEdge * e = *m_iter;
989  if( e->halfedge(m_id) == NULL )
990  {
991  m_id = 0;
992  ++ m_iter;
993  }
994  }
995  break;
996  case 2:
997  m_id = 0;
998  ++m_iter;
999  break;
1000  }
1001  };
1005  bool end() { return m_iter == m_pMesh->edges().end(); }
1006 
1007 
1008 private:
1012  CHalfEdge * m_he;
1016  CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge> * m_pMesh;
1020  typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator m_iter;
1021  int m_id;
1022 };
